meanings.definition: Empathizers: People who understand and share the feelings of others.
meanings.sent1: The empathizers in our group always offer a listening ear to those in need.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the best empathizers in the community for her kindness and understanding.
meanings.sent3: The empathizers at the animal shelter comforted the scared puppies with gentle words.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to be an empathizer in times of crisis was like a beacon of light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The empathizers' presence was like a warm hug on a cold day, bringing comfort to all.

meanings.definition: Empathizers: Those who show empathy towards others.
meanings.sent1: As empathizers, we must strive to understand and support those going through tough times.
meanings.sent2: The empathizers at the hospital volunteered their time to help patients feel cared for.
meanings.sent3: The empathizers in the movie theater shared tissues with those touched by the emotional film.
meanings.sent4: Her actions as an empathizer spoke louder than any words could, showing true compassion.
meanings.sent5: The empathizers' gestures of kindness created a ripple effect of positivity in the community.
